name: Springdale
overview: Horse games series Springdale, is a brand new series of games for you who love horses, mysteries, tasks and not least riding. When a ship has run aground and it has started to leak oil, you will be asked to move out immediately. An oil spill always involves a disaster for both humans and animals. Can you find the crew and can the oil-damaged birds be rescued? The beach landscape offers wonderful rides and obstacle courses. When you want to practice jumping, you can put together your own course! You will also have the opportunity to test your horse knowledge by answering questions. Now you have to show what you are capable of! • Action-packed riding experience • Hestequiz • Navigate with HippoTechen • Build your own springboard • Beach environment • Ride on narrow bridges
